body.p: You will perceve by the enclosed petition that I am in trouble and ask of you to assist me in getting releif will you sign the petition and get the signature of W H Miller and present it to the Govenor and get him if you possibly can to grant us the releif asked -- Your attention to this will will lay us under renewed and lasting obligations
P S If the Govenor grants releif notify me if you pleas my address in South Carellton
